overview: Monolog is a darkly humourous portrait of a sales representative, just returned from a disastrous business trip in the far East.  Walking the streets at night his alienated view of the world is presented as a disembodied voice with a shadow gliding over the pavements. The subjective point of view 'objectifies' his ideas and emotions via the urban enviroment, using them as catalysts for quixotic trains of thought and metaphor.  https://www.luxonline.org.uk/artists/ian_bourn/monolog.html
title: Monolog
